MICROAUTOMATION CONTINUES TO EXPAND ITS EMERGENCY OPERATIONS SOLUTIONS PRACTICE

Former Verizon Business and Frontier Communication's Public Safety Engineer Joins MicroAutomation as NG911 Solutions Architect.

CENTREVILLE, VA, May 20, 2019 -

MicroAutomation, a leading provider of emergency operations and NextGen 911 solutions, announced Bill Corey has joined their NG911 team.
